resources.string: (Hey! This will have maybe a listview or recyclerview or something and it will have the 40 top POP songs. All the songs will have a *play* icon but whichever song is playing will have an *in progress* sort of icon. This way the user doesn\'t have to use the backbutton to pick a different song. They can just pick another. Since the list will be updating daily, we\'ll have to get the data off a server. So maybe retrofit would be in order. Also, the listview would have pictures. So maybe picasso. Thanks for reading!)
